[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ next_background_color=”#ffffff” admin_label=”Hero” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#283d4b” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(128,103,79,0.5)” background_color_gradient_direction=”70deg” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-11.jpg” custom_margin=”0%||0%||true|” custom_padding=”3vw|||||” bottom_divider_style=”mountains2″ bottom_divider_height=”20vw” bottom_divider_repeat=”0.5x” bottom_divider_flip=”horizontal|vertical” locked=”off” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ min_height=”209px” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” header_font_size=”90px” header_line_height=”1.4em” header_2_font=”Josefin Sans||||||||” header_2_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.6)” header_2_font_size=”32px” header_2_line_height=”1.4em” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”4%” header_font_size_tablet=”50px” header_font_size_phone=”32px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”24px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Who we are

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ disabled_on=”on|off|off” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”3.25″ width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” make_fullwidth=”on” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.2)” text_font_size=”10vw” text_line_height=”1em” quote_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” custom_margin=”||-0.4em|” custom_padding=”|||” filter_blur=”7px” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_duration=”10000ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”40%” animation_speed_curve=”linear” text_font_size_tablet=”124px” text_font_size_phone=”90px” text_font_size_last_edited=”off|desktop”]

WHO WE ARE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″ custom_padding=”||28px|||” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-10.jpg” title_text=”EWL-10″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ max_height=”300px”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

INTRODUCTION

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

EWL International is a subsidiary of EWL Ltd, we are an Engineering Consultancy Company which specialises in Project Management, Design Management, and Infrastructure & Transportation Advisory Services for our clients outside the United Kingdom.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-06.jpg” title_text=”EWL-06″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-04.jpg” title_text=”EWL-04″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-05.jpg” title_text=”EWL-05″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

We provide professional services in Project Management, Design Management, Due Diligence, Independent Audits, Project Reviews, Dispute Resolution for Highways, Railway, Trams & Metros, Water, Airports, Bridges, and Transportation Planning projects.

We have an international purpose, providing services from our headquarters in London to many countries. We have experience in Europe, Middle East, LATAM, North Africa, and Asia.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-07-01-scaled.jpg” title_text=”EWL-07-01″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

CORPORATE VALUES & CSR

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

Our values are at the core of everything we do, our behaviour is based on:

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_blurb title=”Sustainable Development” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%234%%” icon_color=”#32a8cc” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta||||||||” header_font_size=”23px” body_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom”]

We help develop the areas where we work, we help building infrastructure that is sustainable socially, environmentally and economically; creating a positive durable impact in the region for generations to come.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_blurb title=”Integrity” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%267%%” icon_color=”#32a8cc” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta||||||||” header_font_size=”23px” body_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom”]

Be believe in what we do and develop durable trust with all our stakeholders. We honour our commitments to our clients, employees and future users of the infrastructure that we build.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_blurb title=”Collaboration” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%259%%” icon_color=”#32a8cc” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta||||||||” header_font_size=”23px” body_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom”]

We believe that we are greater than the sum of our parts. We create synergies with our clients and stakeholders to exceed expectations in all our activities, involving everyone and proactively seeking different points of view. Together we create transportation infrastructure.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb title=”Quality” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%202%%” icon_color=”#32a8cc” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta||||||||” header_font_size=”23px” body_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom”]

We provide exceptional quality in the services we deliver. Quality is of the essence for all the other values to acquire meaning, by providing a quality service to our clients we serve our society and leave a durable legacy behind us.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-09.jpg” title_text=”EWL-09″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

OUR TEAM

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

EWL International is managed by experienced partners, all of them with many years of experience in Design and Construction of Civil Engineering Projects, Building Projects and Project Finance. EWL has its own personnel specialising in Project Management, Design Management, Construction Management, and Project Finance. The solid experience of our team ensures a quality service to our clients, adding value in all phases of the project.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_team_member name=”Amit Sen” position=”Managing Partner” image_url=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-03-copia.jpg” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_font=”Amethysta||||on||||” header_text_color=”#32a8cc” position_font=”||on|on|||||” position_font_size=”18px”]

Amit has over 35 years of experience in Project Management, Engineering Management, Bid Management, project scheme selection, feasibility studies, design management detailed design, construction management, construction, site supervision and testing and commissioning of major Railways and Highway projects in the United Kingdom.

Amit is a Chartered Civil Engineer. He is well versed in all aspects of current developments in the management and control of large multi-disciplinary civil engineering, property development and building projects and was employed by Railtrack/Network Rail and Stagecoach Rail (TOC) where he has been extensively involved in liaison with DfT and many Client Organisations, Contractors, and Consultants, and establishing sound working relationships. He is also well versed in modern engineering, commercial and project management concepts.

[/et_pb_team_member][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_team_member name=”Daniel Delgado” position=”Project & Programme Management Partner” image_url=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-02.jpg” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_font=”Amethysta||||on||||” header_text_color=”#32a8cc” position_font=”||on|on|||||” position_font_size=”18px”]

Daniel has 20 years of experience in the civil engineering industry in diverse roles that comprise design, construction and project & programme management. Qualified Project Manager (PMP, US) and Chartered in 4 countries (UK, Ireland, Spain, Portugal), Daniel has a varied international experience having worked in large infrastructure projects in the UK, Ireland, Portugal, Spain, France, US, Canada, Peru, Paraguay, and Saudi Arabia.

For the last 7 years Daniel has been working in large rail projects in the UK for Network Rail, Transport for London, and other clients as technical advisor, engineering manager (CEM), lead designer (CRE), and project & programme manager. Relevant rail projects include CrossRail, HS2, 4 Lines Modernisation, Dover Sea Wall Reconstruction, West Anglia Main Line Capacity Enhancement, Ottawa & Toronto Light Rails, Sheffield Tram Train, Riyadh Metro, Great Western Route Modernisation (electrification), Gatwick Airport Train Station Development, Bath Corridor Stations Refurbishment, among many others.

[/et_pb_team_member][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_team_member name=”Manesh Kumar” position=”Senior partner” image_url=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-01-copia.jpg” content_tablet=”

Manesh is a global transport infrastructure board executive with overall responsibility for strategic growth and excellence for EWL international. A professional engineer with management degree in management, Manesh has led large global international firms prior to setting up EWL international in 2010 with other partners. Manesh Kumar has worked with Jacobs and other major internal firms prior to EWL international.

Manesh also has over 35 years of experience in leading and managing major international projects in the US, Australia and Middle East.

” content_phone=”

Manesh is a global transport infrastructure board executive with overall responsibility for strategic growth and excellence for EWL international. A professional engineer with management degree in management, Manesh has led large global international firms prior to setting up EWL international in 2010 with other partners. Manesh Kumar has worked with Jacobs and other major internal firms prior to EWL international.

Manesh also has over 35 years of experience in leading and managing major international projects in the US, Australia and Middle East.

” content_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_font=”Amethysta||||on||||” header_text_color=”#32a8cc” position_font=”||on|on|||||” position_font_size=”18px” hover_enabled=”0″ border_radii_image=”off||||” locked=”off” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Manesh is a global transport infrastructure board executive with overall responsibility for strategic growth and excellence for EWL international. A professional engineer with management degree in management, Manesh has led large global international firms prior to setting up EWL international in 2010 with other partners. Manesh Kumar has worked with Jacobs and other major internal firms prior to EWL international.

Manesh also has over 35 years of experience in leading and managing major international projects in the US, Australia and Middle East.

[/et_pb_team_member][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

Organisation Chart

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-Organisation-Chart_Mesa-de-trabajo-1-scaled.jpg” title_text=”EWL-Organisation-Chart_Mesa de trabajo 1″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”footer-ewl(cabecera)” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ bottom_divider_style=”asymmetric2″ bottom_divider_color=”#515553″ global_module=”740″ locked=”off” collapsed=”off”][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”footer-ewl” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#515553″ min_height=”470px” custom_padding=”27px|||||” global_module=”730″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ custom_padding=”|||”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-Logo-3-copia.png” title_text=”EWL Logo 3 copia” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_blurb title=”UK” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”23px” body_font=”Open Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#a5a5a5″ body_font_size=”17px” body_line_height=”1.3em”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”17px”]
